languages.text: {n}Киберпес подчиняется только командам арбитра. Но сейчас он здесь — прыгнул в люк вслед за вами. Значит, его прежний хозяин... мертв?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Киберпес подчиняется только командам арбитра. Но сейчас он здесь — прыгнул в люк вслед за вами. Значит, его прежний хозяин... мертв?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now Glaito is here, he has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his former master is... dead?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now Glaito is here, he has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his former master is... dead?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}
{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

languages.text: {n}生化獒犬只会听从法务官主人的命令，可现在，格雷托却出现在了这里，还跟着你穿过了活板门。这是不是意味着它的主人……已经死了？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生化獒犬只会听从法务官主人的命令，可现在，格雷托却出现在了这里，还跟着你穿过了活板门。这是不是意味着它的主人……已经死了？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los cibermastines solo obedecen a sus amos del Arbites. Pero ahora Glaito está aquí. Te ha seguido a través de la trampilla, lo que significa que su amo debe de estar... ¿muerto?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cibermastines solo obedecen a sus amos del Arbites. Pero ahora Glaito está aquí. Te ha seguido a través de la trampilla, lo que significa que su amo debe de estar... ¿muerto?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir siber mastif yalnızca Yargıcı efendisini dinler. Ancak Glaito burada. Senin peşinden geldi, bu da efendisinin... Öldüğü anlamına mı geliyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir siber mastif yalnızca Yargıcı efendisini dinler. Ancak Glaito burada. Senin peşinden geldi, bu da efendisinin... Öldüğü anlamına mı geliyor?{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、その高等裁定局の主人の命令のみを聞く。しかし、今、グライトはここにいる。グライトが落とし戸を通ってあなたに付いてきたということは、主人が死んだということを意味するのか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、その高等裁定局の主人の命令のみを聞く。しかし、今、グライトはここにいる。グライトが落とし戸を通ってあなたに付いてきたということは、主人が死んだということを意味するのか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un cyber-mastiff n'écoute que son maître de l'Arbites. Mais Glaito est là, avec vous. Puisqu'il vous a suivi à travers la trappe, vous en déduisez que son maître est... mort ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un cyber-mastiff n'écoute que son maître de l'Arbites. Mais Glaito est là, avec vous. Puisqu'il vous a suivi à travers la trappe, vous en déduisez que son maître est... mort ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Cyber-Mastiff hört nur auf seinen Arbites-Meister. Aber jetzt ist Glaito hier. Er ist dir durch die Falltür gefolgt, was bedeuten muss, dass sein Meister ... tot ist?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. But now, Glaito is here. He has followed you through the trapdoor, which must mean that his master is... dead?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Cyber-Mastiff hört nur auf seinen Arbites-Meister. Aber jetzt ist Glaito hier. Er ist dir durch die Falltür gefolgt, was bedeuten muss, dass sein Meister ... tot ist?{/n}
